meanings.definition: One who designs or creates fashionable clothing or accessories.
meanings.sent1: The talented fashioner created a stunning dress for the fashion show.
meanings.sent2: The fashioner showcased their latest collection at the runway event.
meanings.sent3: The fashioner accidentally sewed the sleeve inside out, creating a funny mishap.
meanings.sent4: She was a true fashioner of style, always ahead of the trends.
meanings.sent5: The fashioner's intricate designs left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: To shape or mold something into a particular form or style.
meanings.sent1: She used her hands to fashion the clay into a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor carefully fashioned the marble into a lifelike statue.
meanings.sent3: He tried to fashion a hat out of newspaper, but it didn't quite work.
meanings.sent4: Time and experience had fashioned her into a strong and resilient person.
meanings.sent5: The artist's skilled hands fashioned a masterpiece out of simple materials.
